document_data.name: Unicorn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Unicorn language''' was the racial language of [[unicorn]]s.
document_data.Speakers:
Beyond unicorns themselves, Unicorn was a common secondary language among [[nymph]]s{{Cite dragon/240/Ecology of The Nymph|74}} and many members of [[Faer√ªn]]'s land-dwelling [[elf|elven]] subraces, such as the [[lythari]], [[moon elves]], [[sun elves]], and [[wood elves]].

Unicorn was also fairly common as a secondary language among [[druid]]s devoted to certain nature deities. [[Druid (Eldath)|druids]] of [[Eldath]], [[Druid (Mielikki)|druids]] and druid/[[ranger]]s of [[Mielikki]], the druids of [[Sheela Peryroyl]], the [[Druid (priest)|druids]] of [[Shiallia]], and the druids of [[Silvanus]]. Other forms of [[specialty priest]]s in the Realms for whom Unicorn was a commonly known secondary language included the Eldathyn [[peacemen]] and the Shiallian [[woodwife|woodwives]].
